## CapStyle enumeration

Style of line ending of Ink annotation line.

```csharp
public enum CapStyle
```

### Values (decimal)

| Name | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Rectangular | `1` | End is rectangular. |
| Rounded | `2` | End is rounded. |
